name: Notion
description: All-in-one workspace for notes, tasks, and databases.
longDescription: Notion is a comprehensive workspace that combines note-taking, task management, databases, and wikis. It's perfect for personal use and team collaboration.
features: Rich text editor with markdown support

name: ShareX
description: Free screen capture, file sharing and productivity tool.
longDescription: ShareX is a free and open-source screen capture and file sharing tool. It offers a wide range of capture methods and powerful upload options.
